casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Masoud RASHIDI. No. 510A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2005. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Masoud Rashidi. Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State.

AMENDED

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of October 2005 by Attorney General for extension of time to file brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 7th day of November 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of October 2005."
